hints.text: A {c1}Missile Tank{c0} can be found in {c5}Artaria{c0}.
The {c1}Speed Booster{c0} can be found in {c5}Artaria{c0}.
A {c1}Progressive Missile{c0} can be found in {c5}Cataris{c0}.
The {c1}Power Bomb{c0} can be found in {c5}Cataris{c0}.
A {c1}Progressive Beam{c0} can be found in {c5}Ferenia{c0}.
A {c1}Progressive Spin{c0} can be found in {c5}Ghavoran{c0}.
The {c1}Storm Missile{c0} can be found in {c5}Ghavoran{c0}.
The {c1}Spider Magnet{c0} can be found in {c5}Artaria{c0}.

text_patches.GUI_WARNING_NOT_RANDO_GAME_1: {c2}Error!{c0}|This save slot was created using a different Randomizer mod.
text_patches.GUI_WARNING_NOT_RANDO_GAME_2: You must start a New Game from a blank save slot. Returning to title screen.

spoiler_log.Progressive Beam:
Artaria - EMMI Zone Exit North
Burenia - Gravity Suit Room
Ferenia - Space Jump Room
spoiler_log.Progressive Charge Beam:
Artaria - Invisible Corpius Room
Burenia - Main Hub Tower Top
spoiler_log.Progressive Missile:
Artaria - Energy Recharge Station South
Cataris - EMMI Zone Hidden Missile Room
spoiler_log.Progressive Suit:
Dairon - Big Hub
Hanubia - Total Recharge Station North
spoiler_log.Progressive Spin:
Dairon - Wide Beam Room
Ghavoran - Spin Boost Tower
